name: Four Match
description:
Welcome to Four Match!

Each game piece has four characteristics -- (color [light or dark];  size [large or small]; shape [circle or square]; and hole [with or without]).  You win if you place a piece that completes a line of four of the same characteristics.  A winning line can be horizontal, vertical or diagonal.   

Sound easy?  The twist is that your opponent selects the piece  you play (and you select the pieces he or she will play).  

If the board fills up with no winner, it's a draw.

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

Four Match is built using the LÖVE2d framework.
It is inspired by the game Quatro.
